attributes.action: Stop MPs from changing or creating laws to suit their own agendas
attributes.additional_details: A law from preventing criminals from assaulting emergency workers whilst on duty has taken months, if not years to pass but to pass a bill in hours for the delay of Brexit, a democratic vote which the majority of the country had stated they wanted out of the EU, so they can put across their remain ideologies and overturn the will of the country. This should not be a “we know better than you” scenario. The country has spoken, do not change things to suit you.
attributes.background: The House of Commons passed a law for the delay of Brexit. The current PM wants the UK out of the EU, deal or no deal, on the 31st October along with the majority that voted in 2016 and MPs have gone above and beyond to prevent this from happening.
